# Coordinated Fighter
## Overview
You have learned to fight more efficiently with your arms.

## Requirements and Restrictions
**Prerequisite**: *[[Hoyrall]]**, 12th level*

## Effects
You gain the following benefits:

- If you attack with more than 3 weapons via your Multi-Armed racial feature instead of with more than 2, melee attacks against you gain advantage until your next turn.
- You may wield more than one two-handed weapon. Wielding two two-handed weapon counts as wielding 4 weapons for the purpose of Multi-Armed.
- At 16th level, enemies no longer gain advantage to melee attacks after you attacked with more than 3 weapons.
